html:
He who smote the people in wrath with unceasing blows. Babylon's king was cruel and murderous; also Satan and his followers apparently do not sleep or rest, but they continuously attack and strike out at mortals with unceasing blows.

that ruled the nations in anger with relentless aggression. The king of Babylon's (as well as Satan's) very essence is anger, aggression, and the desire to rule (14:13- 14).
